title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. As a result, the second row is also removed.
EB: When the Delete button is pressed, only the first item on the second row should be deleted. The second row should remain intact.
SR:
1. Press the Delete button. 
2. Notice that the first item on the second row is deleted and the second row is removed.
